name: autotask_search_tickets
description: Search for tickets in Autotask. Returns 25 results per page by default. Use get_ticket_details for full data on a specific ticket.

arguments.name: status
arguments.desc: Filter by ticket status ID (omit for all open tickets)

arguments.name: unassigned
arguments.desc: Set to true to find unassigned tickets

arguments.name: createdAfter
arguments.desc: Filter tickets created on or after this date (ISO format)

arguments.name: createdBefore
arguments.desc: Filter tickets created on or before this date (ISO format)

arguments.name: lastActivityAfter
arguments.desc: Filter tickets with activity on or after this date (ISO format)

name: autotask_search_billing_items
description: Search for billing items in Autotask. Billing items represent approved and posted billable items from the Approve and Post workflow.

arguments.name: postedAfter
arguments.desc: Filter items posted on or after this date (ISO format)

arguments.name: postedBefore
arguments.desc: Filter items posted on or before this date (ISO format)

name: autotask_get_billing_item
description: Get detailed information for a specific billing item by ID

arguments.name: billingItemId
arguments.desc: The billing item ID to retrieve

name: autotask_search_billing_item_approval_levels
description: Search for billing item approval levels. These describe multi-level approval records for Autotask time entries.

arguments.name: approvedAfter
arguments.desc: Filter approvals on or after this date (ISO format)

arguments.name: approvedBefore
arguments.desc: Filter approvals on or before this date (ISO format)

name: autotask_search_time_entries
description: Search for time entries in Autotask. Use approvalStatus=unapproved to find entries not yet posted.

arguments.name: approvalStatus
arguments.desc: Filter by approval status: unapproved, approved, or all (default)

arguments.name: dateWorkedAfter
arguments.desc: Filter entries worked on or after this date (ISO format)

arguments.name: dateWorkedBefore
arguments.desc: Filter entries worked on or before this date (ISO format)
